pr_title: CB-8670 Introduce withSkipOnFail to TestDTO cleanup

timeline.message: CB-8670 Introduce withSkipOnFail to TestDTO cleanup
CB-8670 Introduce withSkipOnFail to TestDTO cleanup

timeline.bodyText: I think in this case we should simply not override the default cleanUp
timeline.author: Bajzathd

replies.bodyText: So should we remove all the cleanUp' is not implemented Override from the project?
replies.author: aszegedi

replies.bodyText: I think yes, and move this message to the default implementation. This way we will have less code, and truly standardized cleanUp
replies.author: Bajzathd

timeline.bodyText:
From the message we can not tell which env was listed - the parent or the child.
I have also refactored this test case in my PR, see here: https://github.com/hortonworks/cloudbreak/pull/8923/files#diff-68f3ed9be95a1bffc91d2b7ec253c58c
I think we should merge these somehow here
timeline.author: Bajzathd

replies.bodyText: I think we should merge your PR first, after that rebase this PR onto master with your changes...
replies.author: aszegedi
